name: govwiki-site
description: California local government civic profile system for CPC
author: vadim ivlev

scripts.push: git add -A . && git commit -am 'v' && git push
scripts.old--coffee: cat coffee/*.coffee > b.coffee/b.coffee && coffee -cm -o js b.coffee/b.coffee
scripts.watch: npm run jadew & npm run coffeew
scripts.dev: http-server -s -o -a localhost & npm run jadew & npm run coffeew & echo 'Launch browser and start editing files'
